#summary Standards applicable to the entirety of the code base

= Syntax =

 * Use "CamelCase", i.e. upperThenLowerNames for methods and variables.

 * Use hard tabs, not spaces.

 * Use semi-objective-c notation for variables. A typical method of access for a variable {{{x}}} is:

{{{
int x;

public void setX(int i) {
   x=i;
}

public int getX() {
   return x;
}
}}}
